General.Name: Elin Electronics Limited
General.Description: Elin Electronics Limited provides design and manufacturing services for electric motors, tools, moulds, dies, kitchen appliances, personal care and lighting products, and automotive components in India and internationally. The company manufactures and assembles switches including lighting ceiling, TPW fans, and modular products, switches, and sockets; LED lighting, fans; small appliances such as dry and steam irons, toasters, hand blenders, mixer grinders, hair dryer, and hair straightener; and fractional horsepower motors, which are used in mixer grinder, hand blender, wet grinder, chimney, air conditioner, heat convector, TPW fans, etc. It also provides terminal blocks for air conditioners; stainless steel blades for mixer grinders, die castings, and radio sets, as well as manufactures medical diagnostic cartridges for use in diagnostic devices; and plastic molded and sheet metal parts and components. The company serves original equipment manufacturers and original design manufacturers. Elin Electronics Limited was founded in 1969 and is based in New Delhi, India.
